pages.text: Some creatures just want to live a peaceful life and stay out of trouble
pages.title: Animals

pages.text: $(thing)Peppermint Snails$() are passive mobs that can be found throughout the dimension. They behave similarly to most animals, but cannot be bred
$(thing)Spearmint Snails$() are passive mobs that can be found throughout the dimension. They behave similarly to most animals, but cannot be bred
